attributes.action: Give David Bowie a state funeral.
attributes.background: David Bowie was one of the most innovative artists of his generation. Not only was his musical influence vast, but his progressive attitude towards sexuality and gender had far-reaching positive influences on society and contributed to creating a more tolerant world than the one he was born into.

rejection.details:
The Government and the House of Commons do not have the power to decide that someone should receive a state funeral. You can find out more about this here: 

http://researchbriefings.parliament.uk/ResearchBriefing/Summary/SN06600

You could start a new petition asking the House of Commons to ask the Queen for a state funeral to be given, and for the House of Commons to provide the money for a state funeral.
